```{r}
library(readr)
data_merged <- read_csv("data/data_merged.csv")
data <- data_merged[-1]
View(data)
```

```{r}
data = data %>% mutate (gross_lost = (colony_lost)/colony_max)
```


```{r}
explore(data)
```

```{r}
unique(data$months)

winter <- data %>% filter(months %in% c("January-March","October-December"))

summer <- data %>% filter(months %in% c("April-June","July-September"))
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2022, week = 2)

colony <- tuesdata$colony
explore(colony)
```


```{r}
explore(winter)
```

```{r}
explore(summer)
```



